General.Name: Ichor Coal N.V
General.Description: Ichor Coal N.V., a mining company, engages in the thermal coal production in South Africa. The company has access to approximately 400 million metric tons of coal resources on 16 properties located in the Mpumalanga coalfields in South Africa. Ichor Coal N.V. was founded in 2011 and is headquartered in Bryanston, South Africa.
